T02D2564:24b-1: nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2564:24b-2: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dus gsum sangs rgyas la blta ba ni /
T02D2564:24b-3: snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje las 'od zer kha
T02D2564:24b-4: dog lnga 'ja' tshon lta bu nam mkha'i mthar thug
T02D2564:24b-5: pa thams cad snang bas khyab pas gsal bar byas
T02D2564:24b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams mang la rgya che ba'i sangs
T02D2564:24b-8: rgyas kyi zhing khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dpag
T02D2564:24b-9: tu med pa mdzad pa bcu gnyis mdzad pa dang
T02D2564:24b-10: / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02D2564:24b-13: byang chub sems dpas bskor ba dang /
T02D2564:24b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod dang /
T02D2564:24b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la sems gtad la blta bar bya'o //
